msg: Allow paths to be passed to environment variables of exec task.

msg: Modified <sql> task to accept #PCDATA and added autocommit attribute.

author: conor
msg: Add the concept of a BuildLogger - A BuildListener with the following
- An output level used to filter build events
- Access to the ant output print stream
Update DefaultLogger to the new interface. In its emacs mode, output
Add -logger option to allow the logger class to be changed
Add -emacs option to control the logger's emacsMode setting

author: bodewig
msg: Removed all command line switches that didn't start with a -.
